radio_stations.title: CGTN Radio
radio_stations.description: CGTN Radio is a global media platform with the slogan “Hear the diffrence.” that provides news, analysis, and commentary on international affairs and Chinese perspectives. It is available in multiple languages and covers a wide range of topics, including politics, economics, culture, and science. CGTN Radio is owned and operated by the China Global Television Network (CGTN), a state-owned media organization based in Beijing, China.

radio_stations.title: CGTN English
radio_stations.description: CGTN English TV Channel is a 24-hour international news channel broadcast to a global audience.

radio_stations.title: CGTN Documentary
radio_stations.description: Listen to CGTN Documentary channel, the only Chinese TV channel to broadcast documentaries in English 24/7.

radio_stations.title: 上海长三角之声广播 FM89.9
radio_stations.description: 上海人民广播电台长三角之声是经国家广电总局批复、全国首家由地方电台创办的区域性广播，也是区域服务于“长三角一体化发展”国家战略的唯一专属媒体。 自2020年10月28日开播以来，长三角之声已成为权威的长三角一体化发展最新进程和政策发布平台、便利的长三角民生服务平台以及精致的长三角品质生活平台。

radio_stations.title: 24/7 Cafe Radio
radio_stations.description: Welcome to 24/7 Cafe Radio. Listen 24/7 to relaxing, chillout, cafe music. Make yourself a drink, maybe a coffee, and just listen to cafe music. This station is produced by the 24/7 Online Radio Group. 24/7 Cafe Radio was launched on 13th November, 2020 to provide high quality cafe music.
